dmca.title: complaint of unauthorized photo copying
dmca.body:
Hello,
 

I am writing to file a complaint of copyright infringement.
 

1.  The copyrighted works at issue are the text and images that appear at:
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com .
 

2.  They can be found at:
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/index.php?q=resume ,
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php ,
    http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php?g2_view=core:ShowItem&g2_itemId=475,
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php?g2_view=core:ShowItem&g2_itemId=476,
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php?g2_view=core:ShowItem&g2_itemId=350
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php?g2_view=core:ShowItem&g2_itemId=11
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/portfolio/main.php?g2_view=core:ShowItem&g2_itemId=758
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/index.php?q=feedback
 

All of the text and photos are copyrighted images of me, Sebastian C. Large and are being used fraudulently by the owners/administrators/Web developers of www.sebastianlarge.com .  The photos were copied at various times from my account at www.modelmayhem.com: 
 

http://www.modelmayhem.com/member.php?id=3437
 

The account at modelmayhem is not fraudulent and is my own account.  My own personal Website, and the one and only personal Website authorized to use copyrighted images of me is www.sebastianlarge.net .
 

I found the offending Website, www.sebastianlarge.com through this search query:
 

Search Query:  sebastian large (on google)
Infringing Web pages:  www.sebastianlarge.com (and all pages contained therein,  referenced above)
 

The offending Web site, www.sebastianlarge.com is also engaging in cyberbullying, cyberterrorism, and harassment of both me and my fianc�e, Shana Zadrick at this location:
 

http://www.sebastianlarge.com/?q=save_seby
 

This cyberbullying, cyberterrorism, and harassment is causing severe mental, emotional, and physical distress and embarrassment to both me and to my fiancee, [private].
 

3.  I can be reached at:  [private]@sebastianlarge.net or at [private]@gmail.com
 

4.  The listed Network Solutions Whois  Administrative contact for the offending Web site, www.sebastianlarge.com is listed as:  [private]@kakuzen.com
 

5.  "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
 

6.  "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

[private]
